topic.title: DITA Map to PDF - based on HTML5 and CSS Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output.

This transformation type uses a CSS based processing engine and HTML5 as an intermediate format. The complete customization documentation can be found here: . For this transformation, the pdf-css-html5 transtype is used.
Because the structure of the HTML5 intermediate format resembles the one used in WebHelp output, it is possible to reuse parts of your CSS file you developed for a WebHelp customization.
